description:
Waterproof shoes for walking in the rain, crossing wide puddles, and stepping through shallow streams. Enjoy dry feet and socks even on wet, windy days.

  • Uppers are waterproof nubuck leather
  • Oboz BDry waterproof breathable membrane keeps out the wet and lets sweat escape
  • Rubber toe caps and heel counters protect your feet and boots
  • BFit Deluxe insoles use three densities of EVA to provide durable cushioning and support
  • Midsoles are dual-density EVA for cushioning and support
  • TPU chassis have nylon shanks for stability and protection
  • Granite Peak soles use high-friction carbon rubber, with asymmetric lugs for traction on loose surfaces
name: Oboz Bridger Low B-Dry Light Trail Shoes - Men's
